program codeforces_342_B

implicit none

integer :: dummy, m, s, f, current_pos, max_t, d

character(len=1) :: direction

integer, allocatable :: a(:), b(:)

!* Step 1: Read first line input*

! First line has 4 tokens: dummy m s f ?

read(*,*) dummy, m, s, f

current_pos = s 

!

!* Read m trap data*

type trap_entry

   integer :: time, a_val, b_val

end type trap_entry

type(trap_entry), dimension(:), allocatable :: traps

allocate( traps(1:m) )

integer :: i

max_t = 0

do i = 1, m

   read(*,*) traps(i)%time, traps(i)%a_val, traps(i)%b_val

   if ( traps(i)%time > max_t ) then

      max_t = traps(i)%time

   end if

end do

! allocate a and b arrays up to max_T.

allocate(a(1:max_t), b(1:max_t))

a[:] = -1 ! initialize as not present.

b[:] = -1

do i = 1,m

    a( traps(i)%time ) = traps(i)%a_val

    b( traps(i)%time ) = traps(i)%b_val

end do

!* Determine direction.*

if ( s < f ) then

   direction = 'R'

   d = +1

else

   direction = 'L'

   d = -1

end if

!* Build the action sequence.*

character(len=:), allocatable :: action_sequence

action_sequence = ''

!

!* Main loop: t from 1 to max_t.*

outer_loop: do t =1, max_t

   ! Check if there is a trap at this time.

   integer :: a_val, b_val

   a_val = a(t)

   b_val = b(t)

   logical :: is_trap = ( a_val /= -1 )

   ! decide what to do.

   if ( is_trap ) then

      ! check if current position is in the trap, or moving into the trap.

      logical in_trap = ( current_pos >= a_val .and. current_pos <= b_val )

      logical moving_into = ( (current_pos + d ) >= a_val ) .and. &

         ( current_pos +d <= b_val )

      if ( in_trap .or. moving_into ) then

         action_sequence = trim(action_sequence)//'X'

      else

         action_sequence = trim(action_sequence) // direction

         current_pos = current_pos + d

      end if

   else ! no trap at this time.

      action_sequence = trim(action_sequence) // direction

      current_pos = current_pos +d

   end if

   ! check if reached target.

   if ( current_pos == f ) then

       exit outer_loop

   end if

end do outer_loop

!* After main loop, continue moving until reach f.*

do while( current_pos /= f )

   action_sequence = trim(action_sequence)// direction

   current_pos = current_pos + d

end do

!* Output the result.*

print *, trim(action_sequence)

end program

program codeforces_342_B

implicit none

integer :: dummy, m, s, f, current_pos, max_t, d, a_val, b_val, i

logical :: is_trap, in_trap, moving_into

logical :: is_trap, in_trap, moving_into

type trap_entry

   integer :: time, a_val, b_val

end type trap_entry

type(trap_entry), dimension(:), allocatable :: traps

integer, allocatable :: a(:), b(:)

read(*,*) dummy, m, s, f

current_pos = s

allocate( traps(m) )

max_t=0

do i=1, m

   read(*,*) traps(i)%time, traps(i)%a_val, traps(i)%b_val

   if ( traps(i)%time > max_t ) max_t = traps(i)%time

end do

 ! Allocate a and b.

allocate( a(0:max_t) )

allocate( b(0:max_t) )

a(:) = -1

b(:) = -1

do i=1,m

   a( traps(i)%time ) = traps(i)%a_val

   b( traps(i)%time ) = traps(i)%b_val

end do

!* Determine direction.

if ( s < f ) then

    direction = 'R'

    d = +1

else

    direction = 'L'

    d = -1

end if

character(len=:), allocatable :: action_sequence

action_sequence = ''

!* Main loop:

outer_loop: do i_t=1, max_t

   a_val = a(i_t)

   b_val = b(i_t)

   is_trap = a_val /= -1

   if ( is_trap ) then

       in_trap = current_pos >= a_val .and. current_pos <= b_val

       moving_into = (current_pos +d) >= a_val .and. &

                     (current_pos +d) <= b_val

       if ( in_trap .or. moving_into ) then

           action_sequence = trim(action_sequence)//'X'

       else

           action_sequence = trim(action_sequence)// direction

           current_pos = current_pos +d

       end if

   else

       action_sequence = trim(action_sequence)// direction

       current_pos = current_pos +d

   end if

   !*** Early exit?

   if ( current_pos == f ) exit outer_loop

end do outer_loop

 !*** Add remaining moves.

do while ( current_pos /= f )

   action_sequence = trim(action_sequence)//direction

   current_pos = current_pos +d

end do

 !*** Output the result.

print*, trim(action_sequence)

 !*** Deallocate

 deallocate(a,b, traps)

end program
